name: 7Days Origins (itch)
description:
This is a place for those who gather to receive a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in the structure of time. Members sometimes become friends, and sometimes turn out to be enemies in order to finish their own assignment. 

Kirel, our amnesiac protagonist who has forgotten even his own name is put on a test.
Everything depends on your choice.
You only have 7 days!  And what would be your choice?

FEATURES
  • Casual gameplay in instant messaging format
  • Mystery text adventure
  • Your choice impact the story and relationships between characters
  • Every character has their own secret and story
  • A lot of challenges and collectibles
  • A multi-episode story with branching paths that leads to four different endings
  • Cross-platform : PC, Android, and iOS!
There is a difference between PC and mobile version.
Please note when purchasing :

7days Origins : Improved the previous mobile game!

  • System modification
  • Interface change
  • Add and change resources
